oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Homestead way to grow grapes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Nine page foldout booklet titled, "Homestead way to grow and grapes," providing instructions on how to grow grapes with descriptions of the best climates, types of soils to use, sites for vineyards, planting vines, caring for vineyard, and pruning, etc. The booklet also includes types of grape insects, fungus diseases of the grape, varieties of grapes, and an illustration of four-cane kniffin method of training grapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hedrick, U. P.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Agriculture; Gardening; Fungi in agriculture; Agricultural pests
Grapes; Fruit; Food; Homesteading
